apps/adding-apps.title: Adding New Apps
apps/adding-apps.description: This guide walks you through adding a new application to the monorepo, using a Next.js admin dashboard as an example.

apps/docusaurus.title: Docusaurus (This Documentation)
apps/docusaurus.description: The apps/docs directory contains the Docusaurus application that powers this documentation site.

apps/nextjs-web.title: Next.js Web App
apps/nextjs-web.description: The apps/web directory contains a Next.js 14 application demonstrating the use of @monorepo-app/ui components.

apps/overview.title: Apps Overview
apps/overview.description: The apps/ directory contains all deployable applications in the monorepo. Each app is independent but can share packages from the packages/ directory.

apps/storybook.title: Storybook
apps/storybook.description: The apps/storybook directory contains the Storybook application for component documentation and visual testing.

components/adding-components.title: Adding New Components
components/adding-components.description: This guide explains how to add new shadcn/ui components to the monorepo using the official CLI.

components/button.title: Button
components/button.description: A versatile button component with multiple variants and sizes.

components/card.title: Card
components/card.description: A container component with header, content, and footer sections.

components/checkbox.title: Checkbox
components/checkbox.description: A checkbox component with label support and controlled state.

components/input.title: Input
components/input.description: A styled text input field component.

components/overview.title: Components Overview
components/overview.description: The @monorepo-app/ui package contains a collection of reusable UI components built with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS.

getting-started/commands.title: Commands
getting-started/commands.description: All available commands for working with the monorepo.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: This guide walks you through setting up the Turborepo shadcn/ui monorepo from scratch.

getting-started/project-structure.title: Project Structure
getting-started/project-structure.description: Understanding the monorepo structure is key to working effectively with this codebase.

guides/claude-code-integration.title: Claude Code Integration
guides/claude-code-integration.description: This monorepo includes custom Claude Code instructions and commands that automate common development tasks, particularly around component management.

guides/development-workflow.title: Development Workflow
guides/development-workflow.description: This guide covers the recommended development workflow for working with this monorepo.

guides/how-turborepo-works.title: How Turborepo Works
guides/how-turborepo-works.description: This guide explains the core concepts of Turborepo and how it optimizes the monorepo workflow.

guides/renaming-namespace.title: Renaming the Package Namespace
guides/renaming-namespace.description: This guide explains how to change the package namespace (e.g., from @monorepo-app to @your-company) across the entire monorepo.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to the Turborepo shadcn/ui Monorepo documentation. This is a modern, production-ready monorepo setup featuring:

packages/adding-packages.title: Adding New Packages
packages/adding-packages.description: This guide walks you through adding a new shared package to the monorepo, using a utilities package as an example.

packages/overview.title: Packages Overview
packages/overview.description: The packages/ directory contains shared code that can be used across multiple apps in the monorepo.

packages/ui-library.title: UI Library (@monorepo-app/ui)
packages/ui-library.description: The packages/ui directory contains the shared component library built with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS.
